Package de.hshannover.dqgui.framework.serialization

Class Serialization

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hshannover.dqgui.framework.serialization.Serialization
  • public final class Serialization
extends java.lang.Object
    Serialization solution using GSON.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register​(java.nio.file.Path path,
                            java.lang.Class<? extends Recoverable> clazz)
        Register a class for serialization.
        A class must have a default constructor or the recovery will fail.
        Parameters:
        path - to register for
        clazz - to register for (must implement Recoverable)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if path or class is null

      • unregister

        public static void unregister​(java.lang.Class<? extends Recoverable> clazz)
        Remove a registered class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - to remove registration for
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if class is null

      • recover

        public static <E extends Recoverable> E recover​(java.lang.Class<E> clazz)
        Recover a serialized object.
        The object has to be registered with the recovery.
        If recovery fails a default instance is returned.
        Type Parameters:
        E - type of recovered class
        Parameters:
        clazz - of the recoverable object
        Returns:
        instance recovered from serialization.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if class null or unregistered
        InvalidClassForRecoveryException - if class does not have the required format

      • recoverUnregistered

        public static <E> E recoverUnregistered​(java.nio.file.Path p,
                                        java.lang.Class<E> clazz)
        Recover a serialized object without registering first.
        If recovery fails a default instance is returned.
        Type Parameters:
        E - type of recovered class
        Parameters:
        p - path of serialized json
        clazz - of the recoverable object
        Returns:
        instance recovered from serialization.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if class null or unregistered
        InvalidClassForRecoveryException - if class does not have the required format

      • dump

        public static boolean dump​(Recoverable r)
        Dump a registered instance to the file system.
        Parameters:
        r - to dump
        Returns:
        true if success

      • dumpUnregistered

        public static boolean dumpUnregistered​(java.nio.file.Path p,
                                       java.lang.Object r)
        Dump a unregistered instance to the file system.
        Parameters:
        p - where to dump
        r - to dump
        Returns:
        true if success
